channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple just patched some versions of iOS that are over a decade old - so you might want to hold on to your old iPhone for a bit
item.description: Apple updates iOS 12 and 15 certificates to maintain essential services, keeping decade-old devices functional in limited roles.

item.title: Move over Thanos, this June Marvel’s Avengers will face their greatest foe yet — Strixhaven’s best elephant mage, and I can’t wait
item.description: We've got a better look at the Marvel decks coming to Magic: The Gathering, but I'm much more excited for Secrets of Strixhaven.

item.title: Waymo reportedly raising a $16B funding round
item.description: Waymo is reportedly finalizing a new funding round that will value the robotaxi company at $110 billion.
